basics.name: Willem Johannes Smith
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Full Stack Developer at Ratchet Capital specializing in production web applications with Docker, PostgreSQL, Express.js, and modern JavaScript frameworks (React, Next.js, Vue.js). Experienced in building SEO-optimized, high-performance applications with 95+ Lighthouse scores, architecting microservices with containerized infrastructure, and implementing comprehensive CI/CD pipelines. Strong foundation from 42 Abu Dhabi's software engineering program with expertise spanning frontend development, backend APIs, database design, and DevOps automation.

work.name: Ratchet Capital
work.summary: Building production applications with focus on Docker containerization, PostgreSQL database architecture, Express.js backend services, and modern frontend frameworks. Specializing in SEO optimization, performance tuning, and scalable microservices infrastructure.
highlights: Architecting Megastars.ai v2 platform serving 500+ influencers with 99.9% uptime using Next.js and Supabase
Achieved 95+ Lighthouse scores on ioMega Energy with comprehensive SEO optimization and 60% CSS reduction
Built Trescudo with 98 Performance score and 85% image size reduction through WebP optimization
Scaled OAuth service to handle 10K+ daily authentication requests across microservices
Developed React Native mobile application with real-time synchronization
Implemented serverless architecture with Cloudflare Workers for sub-100ms response times

projects.name: Megastars.ai v2
projects.description: Influencer marketing platform connecting brands with social media influencers. Built with Next.js, Supabase, and Cloudflare for scalability and performance.
highlights: Architecting platform serving 500+ influencers
Implemented real-time dashboard with live analytics
Built OAuth integration with Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube
Achieved 99.9% uptime with serverless architecture

projects.name: ioMega Energy
projects.description: Production website for energy solutions company with comprehensive SEO optimization and exceptional performance metrics.
highlights: Achieved 95+ Lighthouse scores across all categories
Implemented advanced SEO strategies for organic traffic
Reduced CSS bundle size by 60% with PurgeCSS
Page load time under 2 seconds on 3G networks

projects.name: Trescudo
projects.description: Business application deployed on Vercel with edge computing for optimal performance and global reach.
highlights: 98 Lighthouse Performance score
85% image size reduction with WebP conversion
Edge-deployed for sub-100ms response times globally
Implemented responsive design for all device sizes

projects.name: Verif-y
projects.description: Document verification mobile application with signature capture and real-time synchronization built with React Native.
highlights: Reduced document verification time by 60%
Implemented intuitive signature capture UX
Built real-time sync between mobile and web
Cross-platform support (iOS and Android)

projects.name: ft_transcendence
projects.description: Full-stack web application featuring real-time multiplayer Pong game, live chat, and OAuth authentication. Built as capstone project at 42 Abu Dhabi.
highlights: Led 4-person Agile team completing project in 8 sprints
Implemented WebSocket real-time gameplay and chat
Built OAuth 2.0 authentication system
Designed responsive UI with Vue.js
